Title: Dreaming Awake

Actors: Hiroyuki Nagato, Ineko Arima, Yoshio Inoue, Rie Miyazawa
Plot: A university art professor who is about to be promoted becomes friends with a student who, in turn, respects and admires his teacher. The two become involved in each others lives and the ...
